name: Reflection Paper Template
description: Reflective essay template for analyzing personal learning experiences and growth

sections.title: Introduction
sections.content:
## Introduction

### Context
[Briefly introduce the experience, course, reading, or event you are reflecting upon]

### Purpose
[Explain the purpose of this reflection and what you hope to explore or learn]

### Thesis Statement
[State your main insight or learning from the experience]

*Example: "Through [experience], I discovered that [main insight], which has fundamentally changed how I approach [topic/skill]."*
sections.placeholder: Introduce what you're reflecting on and your main insight...

sections.title: Description of Experience
sections.content:
## Description of Experience

### What Happened
[Provide an objective description of the experience, event, reading, or activity]

### Key Moments
[Identify the most significant moments or aspects]
- **Moment 1**: [Description]
- **Moment 2**: [Description]
- **Moment 3**: [Description]

### Initial Reactions
[Describe your initial thoughts and feelings]
sections.placeholder: Describe the experience you're reflecting on...

sections.title: Analysis and Reflection
sections.content:
## Analysis and Reflection

### What Did I Learn?
[Analyze what you learned from this experience]

### How Did I Learn It?
[Reflect on the learning process itself]

### Why Is It Important?
[Explain the significance of what you learned]

### Connections to Course Material
[Connect your experience to theories, concepts, or readings from the course]
- **Concept 1**: [How it relates to your experience]
- **Concept 2**: [How it relates to your experience]

### Critical Insights
[Provide deeper analysis and critical thinking about the experience]
sections.placeholder: Analyze what you learned and why it matters...

sections.title: Personal Growth and Change
sections.content:
## Personal Growth and Change

### Before vs. After
[Compare your understanding or perspective before and after the experience]

**Before**: [Your previous understanding/beliefs]

**After**: [Your new understanding/beliefs]

### Skills Developed
[Identify specific skills you developed or improved]
- Skill 1: [Description and examples]
- Skill 2: [Description and examples]
- Skill 3: [Description and examples]

### Challenges Overcome
[Discuss challenges you faced and how you addressed them]

### Changed Perspectives
[Explain how your perspective has changed]

sections.title: Application and Future Action
sections.content:
## Application and Future Action

### How Will I Apply This Learning?
[Discuss how you will apply what you've learned in future situations]

### Specific Action Steps
1. [Action step 1]
2. [Action step 2]
3. [Action step 3]

### Goals for Continued Growth
[Set goals for continuing to develop in this area]

### Areas for Further Exploration
[Identify topics or skills you want to explore further]
sections.placeholder: Explain how you'll apply your learning...

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.content:
## Conclusion

### Summary of Key Insights
[Summarize your main insights and learning]

### Significance
[Reflect on the overall significance of this experience for your personal and academic development]

### Final Thoughts
[Provide closing reflections on the experience and your growth]

instructions: Balance description with analysis and reflection
Connect personal experiences to academic concepts
Be honest and authentic in your reflections
Show evidence of critical thinking and self-awareness
Use specific examples to illustrate your points
Maintain a thoughtful, analytical tone while being personal
